Applications are invited for research staff positions in at Samsung Advanced Institute of Technology (Korea). The work involves ab initio calculation (density functional theory), molecular dynamics simulation, atomistic structure modeling, Monte Carlo calculation, electron energy loss spectroscopy, aberration (Cs)-corrected electron microscopy.
Candidates should have a PhD degree in physics or theoretical chemistry. Candidates should manage such programs as VASP, CASTEP, WIEN2K, FEFF and have a high level of English language.
An experience in high-resolution transmission electron microscopy and high-resolution scanning transmission electron microscopy will be an advantage.
Candidates are expected to send curriculum vitae (in english) by e-mail to: Dr. Dmitry D. Zaytsev e-mail: dmitry.zaytsev@samsung.com
